description:
doc: link the race detector document into the release notes
Also:
- put GORACE into the go env command
- do minor housekeeping on the race detector article

Fixes issue 4995.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM https://codereview.appspot.com/8319044/diff/1/doc/articles/race_detector.html File doc/articles/race_detector.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/8319044/diff/1/doc/articles/race_detector.html#newcode109 doc/articles/race_detector.html:109: its report to a file named log_path.pid. put the on the other side of the emphasis

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=67c421fdda3c ***

doc: link the race detector document into the release notes
Also:
- put GORACE into the go env command
- do minor housekeeping on the race detector article

Fixes issue 4995.

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/8319044

subject: code review 8319044: doc: link the race detector document into the release notes
